title: Jailhouse Rock
description: When Bonnie's Cousin goes to prison just for having the wrong friends, She goes faithfully to visit him. She notices the good looking guard there all the time, but feels it would be awkward to approach him. Dean watched Bonnie every time she came to the prison and finds himself falling for the frequent visitor with the speed of a freight train. When he hears her singing one day, there in the visiting room, he realizes he just has to get to know her. The question is, how?Can these two overcome their hesitance and find a way to be together?
author: A.R. Von
